title: Deploy to Vercel
description: Deploy a static site to Vercel using the Build Output API

outputPath.description: Path to the build output directory (e.g., dist/apps/my-app)

projectName.description: Vercel project name. Defaults to the Nx project name.

prod.description: Deploy to production. When false, creates a preview deployment.

token.description: Vercel API token. Falls back to VERCEL_TOKEN environment variable.

org.description: Vercel organization/team ID. Falls back to VERCEL_ORG_ID environment variable.

projectId.description: Vercel project ID. Falls back to VERCEL_PROJECT_ID environment variable.
